original_body_lines: Reaffirming its commitment to bringing cutting-edge digital health solutions, eChannelling, Sri Lanka’s largest channelling network, powered Medicare 2023, one of the most anticipated healthcare exhibitions in the country. Held recently at the Bandaranaike Memorial International Conference Hall (BMICH), the event attracted participants from both B2C and B2B sectors, showcasing eChannelling’s capacity in business and digital lifestyle services.

As the first software development and ICT service provider to enter the digital healthcare industry in Sri Lanka, eChannelling over the years has transformed the healthcare industry through ground-breaking solutions. In addition, Mindrone technology which garnered significant attention, showcased how technology can help ease stress management and conduct stability analysis on individuals through a headband integrated to a drone system.

The event was graced by Mr. Chandika Vitharena, Chief Executive Officer of Mobitel (Pvt) Ltd, along with other dignitaries who attended the opening ceremony. Partnering with the exhibition was a fruitful exercise as eChannelling was able to further expand its relationships with local and international hospitals and medical institutes, demonstrating its extensive knowledge and expertise in the digital healthcare industry.

Medicare 2023 was organised by the Organizing Committee of Medicare under the patronage of the Ministry of Health Sri Lanka in collaboration with specialist medical associations which strives to create the right healthcare awareness to the public at the right time. The event showcased the latest in modern healthcare, disease prevention, effective treatment methods, newest technology, and latest services available in Sri Lankan hospitals and laboratories as well as latest technologies in the global medical sector.

Since its inception, eChanneling has revolutionised the Sri Lankan healthcare sector by bridging the gap between healthcare service providers and the public, through the upliftment of digital health solutions thereby improving effectiveness and efficiency in a user-friendly manner. The company’s dominance over this domain over the last 2 decades has seen it carve a large market share, with the brand undoubtedly at the forefront in leading Sri Lanka’s healthcare and digital lifestyle services to a new paradigm.
